Name: SeriesRepositoryLocation
Description: Location of the repository containing the series. This may be repeated for multiple repository locations.

Name: SeriesName
Description: The full name of the series. The structure supports the use of multiple language versions of the content. If the name varies depending upon the context or is known by multiple names, this element may be repeated.

Name: SeriesAbbreviation
Description: Abbreviation of the series name. Repeat for multiple abbreviations for the SAME series Name.

Name: SeriesDescription
Description: Describe the purpose of coverage of the series. The structure supports the use of multiple language versions of the content.
